#labels Phase-Design,Phase-Implementation
= URL format standard =

== Index ==
|| */index/* || index page of CDOJ ||

== Problem ==
|| */problem/list/* || problem list, page 1 ||
|| */problem/list/{page}* || problem list, {page} defined the page to show ||
|| */problem/{id}/ || show problem{id}* ||
|| */problem/{id}/submit/* || submit problem{id} ||
|| */problem/{id}/status/* || status of problem{id} ||
|| */problem/{id}/edit/* || admin page of problem{id} ||
